title: What is the interpretation of seeing figs in a dream by Ibn Sirin and leading scholars?

preview.html: Interpretation of the presence of figs in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq: Figs are a seasonal fruit grown in tropical countries. It has many health benefits related to diabetes and heart disease. It is also useful in reducing high blood cholesterol. The dreamer sees figs in a dream and asks for an interpretation. Through this article you will find all the questions you want. Interpretation of a dream about figs. The translator Ibn Sirin confirmed that seeing figs in a barren dream is a praiseworthy vision. Because it shows the legitimate successor in the near future. If a young man dreams of figs in his dream, then this dream is interpreted to mean that he will collect money without toiling or having trouble with it. If the dreamer eats the fruit of figs in his dream, it should portend that joys will fill his life, and with it Many victories and excellence in life. Eating fig fruit in its season is one of the visions that brings goodness, but if the dreamer eats this fruit early, then the dream indicates that the dreamer has many blessings given to him by God, and because of him people look at him with envious eyes. If If this fruit is repeated in the dream, it means that the dreamer is a liar and swears a lot in his daily life so that others will believe him, but the abundance of God’s curse on unrealistic things can make him vulnerable to it. God's wrath is upon him, so the dreamer must pay attention. Fertility and the flow of nutrition are considered among the most important interpretations of seeing figs in a dream, especially if the dreamer is a person who has suffered a lot in his life due to his poor financial situation. The jurists said: The color of this fruit makes a difference in the interpretation of the vision. If it were white They were better in the dream than black figs. If the dreamer sees the leaves of a fig tree without eating its fruits, the vision will mean that the dreamer will enter a spiral of oppression and sadness in the coming days. If an unmarried woman dreams of a fig tree growing before her eyes in a dream, then this The vision interprets that the dreamer will marry a famous young man and a prominent member of society and will be famous for his wisdom and strength. One dream interpreter said that figs in a dream for men may indicate the sexual desire that dominates them, especially if the dreamer is young. The fresher the fig leaves are in the dreamer’s dream, the greater his success. And his production at work, and this production will increase his salary. To get the correct interpretation, search on Google for an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Buying figs in a dream If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is inside the market where fruit is sold and he stands in front of the fig seller and buys a lot from him and continues eating figs. Until he feels full, the vision shows financial benefits. Which the dreamer will feel without any fatigue. If an unmarried woman buys figs in her dream, the vision will be interpreted that the man she will marry will be pious and will not violate the rights of God’s servants. Buying figs in a dream for a married womanIf the dreamer is married and gives birth only to females, and dreams that she buys figs in In a dream, the vision indicates that she will soon give birth to a brother to her daughters. Likewise, if she sees in her dream that her husband gave her a plate of figs and she took it from him, then this vision interprets good news for her.

title: Interpretation of seeing an ugly man in a dream: Marrying an ugly person in a dream

preview.html: We explain to you the vision of the ugly face of Ibn Sirin, an ugly woman, marrying an ugly man, marrying a shapeless man in a dream, single, married and pregnant. Interpretation of the ugly in a dream The ugly face is a source of despair and hopelessness, and in dreams a misfortune or a bad deed. An ugly man in a dream symbolizes an action Hatred, hardness of heart, and ingratitude. Interpretation of an ugly man in a single girl’s dream: It is a very negative sign, especially if she sees him near her or in her circle. It is a symbol of failure, disappointment, and bad luck in practical and emotional matters. It is not good in visions for a woman to stand alone. Marrying an ugly or reprehensible man, this may express fatigue and unhappiness in the future. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is running away or moving away from a deformed or ugly-faced person, then this is her interpretation that she is a person trying to distance herself from all kinds of evil. If she sees that she is If a woman sees that her husband is becoming ugly or deformed while awake, this is an expression that she will face great difficulties. In the future, whether familial, emotional, or financial. Ugliness in this context is fatigue and unhappiness, but it is fleeting, God willing, and a married woman must have a spirit of patience and not be attracted to whims or random behavior, because fate hides beauty behind ugliness. A married woman sees In her dream that a strange and ugly man enters her house and eats her livelihood, or she sees that he is trying to harm her, then this interpretation is a direct danger to her and she must avoid some negative things such as - excessive spending or extravagance, and the married woman, after seeing her, must avoid quarreling with the husband as much as possible, and this is a condition. From self-control. I marry a man with an ugly face in a dream. A groom who is in a vision of bad character is, in the interpretation, a misfortune for a woman. Whoever dreams that she is marrying an ugly man, she will face many obstacles in her waking life, whether in the issue of marriage itself or in other matters such as living, working, and earning. If a woman marries an ugly groom in her dream, and she sees that those present at the wedding are looking at him with ridicule and mockery, and she feels a little shy in her dream, then this is her interpretation. If a woman or girl sees the ugliness of the groom’s face as normal, and they accept him as a husband, and she feels affection or love towards him. Or contentment, until it seems that she finds him uncomfortable or disapproving, but on the contrary, he becomes prettier and more beautiful in her eyes, then this is his interpretation that he will accomplish goodness after being patient. The deceased has an ugly face in a dream, a sign of deep psychological alienation and in the interpretation it symbolizes bad luck. If the deceased was known He appeared in the dream with an ugly face, then this is his interpretation of his bad deeds in his worldly life, and he only appeared in the dream seeking forgiveness and forgiveness. If he cries in the dream, this indicates strong remorse on his part, and if he appears to be laughing at his laughter, then he is in a bad or unpleasant situation. Famous or prestige

title: Interpretation of the dream of entering ihram in a dream and its interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of Ihram in a dream: Ihram is a Muslim’s determination and readiness to perform the Hajj obligation in obedience to God Almighty and in imitation of our Prophet Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace. Mecca Al-Mukarramah, in terms of the second chapter, relates to the place where the pilgrim intends to perform the Hajj obligation. There are clothes for women and men and the interpretation of the dream of Ihram in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of Ihram in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Among his interpretations, Ibn Sirin shows the signs that indicate many dreams, including the interpretation of Ibn Sirin. To dream of ihram in a dream. If he sees an unmarried woman wearing ihram clothes in his dream, this indicates the approaching engagement of his engagement. Also, if the dreamer is married, this indicates the presence of dryness and distance between the spouses and major disagreements. It also symbolizes the dreamer’s distance from sin or anything contrary to religion. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing tamarind with details from Ibn Sirin and Al-NabulsiInterpretation of a dream about ihram in a dream for menIhram in a dream is one of the dreams that often indicates goodness. The interpretation of a dream about ihram for a man has many connotations, such as: This dream symbolizes comfort and reassurance for the person, and that God will grant him many good things and bless them. It also indicates the dreamer’s closeness to God and his distance from forbidden things. On the other hand, if the dreamer owes money to others and sees this The dream portends for him some comfort and the release of his money. In addition, it also indicates the return of his marital life to the right track and its safety after many disagreements and heartaches. But if the man sees this dream alone or separately, and his appearance in this The dress is attractive, so this gives him good news about a woman who will help him in this world and will reward him. Likewise, if he sees in a dream that he is wearing Ihram clothes and he is happy with them, this indicates his high status among the people in his life. Seeing Ihram clothes in a dream Ihram clothes are special clothing for men or women. To perform the rituals of Hajj or Umrah, and seeing Ihram clothing in a dream has symbols, which are: Ihram clothing in a dream other than the time of Hajj symbolizes the poverty of men, unlike women, which symbolizes changing their lives for the better. It also indicates the end of the viewer’s accumulated debts. Perhaps it is good news that He will perform Hajj. And if the fortuneteller becomes ill and sees the Hajj dress, he will be happy to see that he will recover soon. On the other hand, if someone he knows sees that he is sick and sees him in a dream wearing the Ihram dress and his health behind him, this indicates the death of the sick person. Also, if he sees himself wearing the Ihram dress and is surprised With it, it indicates his salvation from his many debts. In general, this vision indicates that life has progressed and changed for the better, and the arrival of many pleasant events in his life. See also: Interpretation of dreams about crossing a busy road and its consequences. Wearing the ihram in a dream for a married woman. Wearing the ihram in a dream for a married woman symbolizes Many people, including God’s satisfaction with her, a good marital relationship, and other interpretations, such as: This dream shows a married woman that there are difficulties she is going through, but their end is near. It also indicates God’s satisfaction with her, and that she

title: Interpretation of seeing tomatoes in a dream for a single woman, a pregnant woman, and a man

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing tomatoes in a dream for single women, pregnant women and men. Tomatoes are a red fruit that is used in many foods and recipes that everyone should eat. The appearance of tomatoes in a dream attracts the attention of the beholder, as is the case in dreams that interpret tomatoes in a dream, and seeing them indicates goodness and abundant food that the dreamer will receive. And the people around him in the coming period. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing tomatoes in a dream for a single woman, a pregnant woman, and a man. Interpretation of a dream about seeing tomatoes in a dream. Scientists interpret seeing tomatoes in a dream as evidence of goodness and justice for the dreamer in life, because they are round in shape and beautiful in color, symbolizing goodness and broad life. Tomatoes in a dream indicate the arrival of happy news that will come to the dreamer. As for whoever dreams that he is eating tomatoes and their taste is delicious, this symbolizes his illness and God will heal him soon. It should be noted that whoever sees in his dream that he has tomatoes in his house or in his room, this indicates that he He will have a future wife. But if he is single, this indicates that he will enter into a love relationship with one of the girls whose heart he will love. God knows best. But if the dreamer sees in a dream an infinite number of tomatoes, this indicates that abundant money will come to him. Interpretation of the dream of seeing tomato juice in a dream for a single woman. Dream interpretation scholars believe that if a single woman sees in a dream that she is eating tomatoes in a dream, This symbolizes that she will get the right person who will become her lover and friend for life, and perhaps the relationship will develop and she will become her. The husband and man she has always dreamed of. Likewise, tomatoes in a dream may indicate that she has a lot of people who love and surround her. If you eat tomatoes in a dream, they are those who are in love and friendship with the other party, but if you do not eat them, they show that they are watching these lovers. On the other hand, commentators believe that if an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is eating rotten tomatoes, then this It symbolizes that she may enter into a romantic relationship, but it will not be completed or culminated in marriage. Interpretation of a dream about seeing tomatoes in a dream for a pregnant woman. Various dream interpretations are related to seeing tomatoes in a dream for a pregnant woman, because it symbolizes that she has a male child. If the tomatoes are red and green, this symbolizes that he has a beautiful girl. Interpretation of a dream about seeing tomatoes in a dream for a man: Red tomatoes in a man’s dream symbolize a fair woman, while green tomatoes symbolize that he will obtain abundant sustenance. But if a man sees tomatoes in a dream while he is At home or in his room, this symbolizes the diet in which a person accumulates a lot. You can also, dear reader, interpret another dream by entering the instant dream interpretation application. Eating or buying tomatoes in a dream is a dream that can appear to anyone. Not everyone eats tomatoes and uses them in different recipes on a daily basis

title: Interpretation of the name Muhammad in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: The name Muhammad in an unmarried woman’s dream Muhammad is a male scientific name that means exaggeration of the grace of God Almighty, and there are many people who name their children Muhammad after the name of the Noble Messenger - may God bless him and grant him peace. Seeing the name Muhammad in a dream for one girl makes her wonder about the different meanings and interpretations that this dream brings to her. Is it good for her or harmful to her, and this we will learn together in the following lines of the article. The name Muhammad in an unmarried woman’s dream. Below is the most important evidence that is mentioned when seeing The name Muhammad in a dream for a single woman: The name Muhammad in a dream symbolizes tolerance and tolerance. If a girl suffers from injustice and some people oppress her rights, this vision brings her good news of relief from distress, a life in bliss, comfort, and tranquility, and meeting the righteous in it. A life that treats her kindly. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream a person named Muhammad who has an attractive body and speaks tactfully, this is a sign of happy events that will accompany her during the next period of her life. A girl’s dream of the name Muhammad may lead to her being associated with a man with the same surname, marrying him, and living with him. A happy and peaceful life free of temptation and temptation. If an unmarried woman sees that she has met a man in her dream, Muhammad, this is a sign that everything that causes her sadness and anguish and affects her negatively will end. Through Google, you can join us on a site about the secrets of dream interpretation, and you will find everything you are looking for. About him. The name Muhammad in an unmarried woman’s dream by Ibn Sirin. One of the most prominent interpretations cited by the scholar Ibn Sirin - may God have mercy on him - in interpreting seeing the name Muhammad in an unmarried woman’s dream is: If a girl sees during her sleep an unknown person named Muhammad and feels very happy while talking to him, This is a sign of her desire and constant prayer that God will bless her with good news soon. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream a stranger entering her house and asking him his name, and he answers “Muhammad” in a polite manner and she feels happy at that moment, then this is a sign of the presence of a young man present. She is about to get married, which makes her very happy. The meaning of the name Muhammad in a dream for an unmarried woman. If an unmarried girl sees the name Muhammad in her dream, this is a sign of her good morals and the love of many around her, and the dream can be interpreted that God - Glory be to Him - will fulfill her dreams. Always what is required. If a girl dreams that she is talking to a person named Muhammad, this is a sign that she will receive advice and that she will learn from the experiences of others. In the case of an unmarried woman who sees the death of a person named Muhammad in a dream, this proves that she has committed many mistakes, sins and taboos, and seeing The name Muhammad Mahaha symbolizes the evil that comes out of her and herself. People around her. Seeing a person named Muhammad in a single woman’s dream. Interpretation scholars say that if a girl sees in her dream a person named Muhammad courting her, this is a sign that her association with a man who is close to a man of religion and morals will bring her happiness and he will make every effort for her. she has. Comfort and happiness. And if a girl dreams

title: Interpretation of a dream about hair loss for a married woman

preview.html: And seeing hair falling out all at once in a dream, here is an indication of the heavy burdens and intense matters that concern her, as she goes through them and does them in her life, and that she sees many occupations in her life, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of seeing hair falling out in a dream for a single girl. If a woman dreams of another woman. A married woman saw in a dream that her hair was suddenly falling out in the dream and it looked very bad. Here is an indication of the many burdens that this single woman bears in her life. Here it indicates the presence of financial crises that this married woman will see in the future. Her life and she suffers from it. Despite his attempt to eliminate hair loss in the dream. The meaning indicates that there are sad things in her life, and she will succeed in getting rid of them, God willing. And if a married woman sees in a dream that her husband is trying to prevent her hair loss. This is an indication that they will get rid of the financial crisis that It will occur during this time. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing sweets in a dream for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin and the leading interpreters

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing sweets in a dream for a married woman. The interpretation of seeing him eating sweets in a dream includes many explanations and explanations that warn of bad news sometimes and can be good in small situations. He has a debt, and through the following article we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about seeing sweets in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about seeing sweets in a dream in general. There are many interpreters who interpreted seeing and eating sweets in a dream, and it is worth noting that they deduced many different interpretations and meanings. From it She saw in a dream that she was eating porridge or harissa sweets, then this vision shows the harm she received from her children and their disobedience to her. It should be noted that if one of them sees in a dream that she is eating sweets, this indicates her high status, high position, and acquisition of abundant goods. It should be noted that the vision A gift of candy in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates her success in her love life and her soon marriage. Whoever sees that he is giving a sweet gift to someone in a dream, this means his desire to fix his affairs with that person and return his life to stability again. See also: Reasons for repeating a dream with The same person.. Interpretation of repeatedly seeing someone you love in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of seeing sweets in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman eating sweets in a dream may indicate some different and diverse signs that may herald good or bad for her. If a married woman sees that she is eating white sweets, this is In this vision there is evidence that she will receive blessings, abundant livelihood, and achieve what she aspires to and desires. Regarding the fact that a married woman sees a lot of sweets in a dream, this vision indicates that she and her family will receive good and abundant money and may mean that she will receive good news. However, if a relative offers sweets to a married woman who does not have children, then this vision indicates that she will become pregnant soon, God willing. See also: Seeing a scorpion in a dream is good news.. Interpretation of seeing a scorpion in a dream for a married and single woman. Interpretation of a dream about seeing sweets in a dream for a single woman if she sees a girl If an unmarried girl sees herself eating candy in a dream, this vision has different meanings and signs for an unmarried woman. If an unmarried girl sees that she is eating candy in a dream for an unmarried woman, this symbolizes that she will soon have a relationship or a close relationship with someone. If an unmarried girl sees herself eating candy in a dream, this symbolizes that she will soon have a relationship or a close relationship with someone. An unmarried woman sees sweets in a dream without eating them, then this vision is a sign that her engagement will not continue and she will not marry the person with whom she is in a relationship. Interpretation of the dream of seeing sweets in a dream for a pregnant woman. After we have presented to you the interpretation of the dream of seeing sweets in a dream for a married woman and a single girl, Through the following paragraph, we will provide you with the resulting interpretations of seeing sweets in a pregnant woman’s dream as follows: If a pregnant woman sees in a dream that she is eating sweets, and this is in the last months of pregnancy, this means

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a man committing indecency with another man in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream in which he sees a man cheating with a man. The natural human instinct requires that marriage be of the opposite sex, but the deviation and inclination towards the same sex was not the result of this era, but rather appeared since ancient times and the people of Lot were known for practicing sodomy and homosexuality among men, while the people of Isaac were known Practicing lesbianism by committing debauchery between women, but what is the significance of this according to the science of dream interpretation? In this article, we will provide you with the interpretation of a dream in which you see a man committing an indecency with a man. The interpretation of a dream in which you see a man committing an indecency with a man, according to the most famous commentators. Verses of the Holy Qur’an have warned against indecency and falling under the influence of Satan’s whisperings. We had a lesson about the people of Lot. God annihilated them because of the sins and disobedience they committed, even though they insisted on that stubbornness and disbelief in God Almighty and the message of His Prophet, as God Almighty said: They were the first to be. We throw stones and tree trunks at them), and in this context we explain to you the interpretation of a dream in which you see a man committing an indecency against another man: When you see an indecent act with a man in a married man’s dream. This is evidence that the person has committed sins in his life and must repent to God. And if a young man sees That he commits indecency with another man of his gender. This indicates the emergence of worries and sorrows. But seeing a man committing indecency with another man in a married woman’s dream is evidence of the husband’s misdeeds and sins. Whereas a single woman seeing a man committing adultery indicates bad events and things. It may happen in her life. See also: Interpretation of gray shoes in a dream for a single woman and its most important indicators. Interpretation of dreams for a man committing indecency with a man I know. When a person dreams of people who practice immorality or indecency, he feels anxious and afraid about that and may rush to find an explanation for that. When a man sees someone he knows, he is committing Homosexuality in a dream. This leads to one following one’s desires, and committing sins and transgressions. And if an unmarried woman sees that he is violating modesty with another girl. The interpretation of this harm to them is extreme and sad. But seeing an inappropriate act with a woman you know in a separate dream. Indicates that you She follows him and goes on the wrong path. It may indicate that the woman has committed sins and sins in the company of the woman accompanying her in the dream. He must return and repent to God Almighty. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a big fish in a dream and its interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about my husband exercising with a man. The practice of deviating from common sense is one of the matters Which the Islamic religion denies, and even forbids, obligating those who do it to return to God Almighty, but seeing this in a dream can have other positives as well. Negative connotations. The life of the dreamer and what was said about the interpretation of a dream about a husband practicing with a man: The vision may indicate a business partnership and perhaps a joint trade between them. The vision may show a downfall. But there are unwelcome signs that can be seen: Beware of the enemy. And if one sees in his dream that another man commits Indecency against him, this indicates that the offender will benefit from his perpetrator. While in the case of a man committing indecency against another, the vision shows that the other takes from his money. Or intends to commit an indecency against him.

title: Interpretation of a dream about bread in different cases according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing bread in a dream in different situations according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Other problems can be caused by bread, so doctors prevent them from eating bread of any kind. Some people see bread in a dream, so they are very curious to know the meaning and interpretation of this vision, so in this article we will learn together today about me, the interpretation of seeing bread in a dream in different cases according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin.Interpretation of the dream of seeing bread in a dream Interpretation of Ibn SirinInterpretation of Ibn Sirin This vision is considered one of the good visions that portends goodness and shows the extent of the dreamer’s desire to achieve what he wants in reality. If the dreamer sees that he is preparing bread in a dream and eating it, then this vision shows the piety of the dreamer and the goodness of his condition. When the dreamer sees that he is making bread and sees the fire of the oven This is a good sign that expresses goodness and vitality and indicates that he will earn a lot of money or will be promoted to a high rank. When the dreamer dreams that he is using corn flour to prepare bread, this vision may mean that he will obtain a lot of money after hardships and hardships. If the dreamer sees that he He makes bread and eats it immediately after taking it out of the oven. This is an unfavorable sign for him, because it expresses a non-halal diet in reality. If the dreamer sees that he is baking barley bread, then this interpretation lies in piety, piety, and commitment to acts of obedience in reality. When the dreamer dreams of burning bread Which he makes in a dream, this is a sign of his failure to achieve his goals on earth. If the dreamer is actually sick and sees this vision, this is an indication of his recovery from his illness, and God knows best. When the dreamer sees that he is making bread quickly in a dream, this means that he was able to achieve His dreams in reality. If the dreamer sees that he is kneading his bread in a dream and it is difficult, this means that those close to him will harm him, but if it is spoiled or fermented, this indicates bad deeds. Interpretation of a dream about seeing making bread in a dream for a single woman. As for the meaning of this dream for a girl, it is One of the most promising visions for her, expressing the achievement of success and distinction in reality if she is a student. This dream also foretells the imminent date of her marriage on earth, and God knows best. If the bread that an unmarried woman makes in a dream is made of barley, this is an undesirable sign. It indicates that she is going through crises in reality. Interpretation of a dream about seeing bread in a dream for a married woman. Seeing making bread in a dream for a married woman is one of the good dreams that indicate goodness and abundance of sustenance for the dreamer in reality. If the dreamer has children in reality, then this vision shows the extent to which She is really trying to raise her children properly. When the dreamer sees that she is preparing fresh bread in a dream, this is good news for her that she will give birth soon, and God knows best. As for seeing a married woman making bread to distribute to the needy, this is evidence of her good deeds in reality. Interpretation of the dream of seeing bread in a dream For a pregnant woman: For a pregnant woman to dream of making bread indicates the gender of the fetus, and indicates the birth of a son, by God

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing perfume in a dream?

preview.html: Trend website offers you an interpretation of the perfume of your dreams. Perfume is a cosmetic and is considered a sign of beauty. The fragrance is characterized by its beauty and uniqueness. Seeing perfumes in a dream has many meanings that you will learn from this article. We have also provided you with explanations about the smell of perfume. Perfume in a dream is complete, as is giving perfume to a dead person in a dream in full, and spraying perfume in a dream is good news. We provide you with everything related to the interpretation of the complete gift of perfume in a dream for the vessel of pregnant and married women, as well as travelers, from the books of major scholars of interpretation of dreams and visions. Why do the souls of Ibn Sirin dream? ?Seeing perfume or musk from the book of Ibn Sirin in a dream is a complete testimony to success, success, and the fulfillment of desires. In addition, seeing perfume in a dream complete, and it was good and beautiful, is an indication that the dreamer will earn a lot of money in the next life. Seeing Perfume in a dream, filled with spray or scent, is good news that the dreamer will receive goodness, blessing and great benefit that will befall him. Seeing perfume for a person in trouble means getting rid of all his worries, directing his mind, as well as calming and calming the dreamer. Why dream of smelling perfume for an ordinary woman? Seeing perfume For an unmarried woman in a dream, it is complete evidence of the purity, chastity, good spirit, and good morals that characterize this girl. Buying perfumes in a dream for an unmarried girl is good news about her marriage to a pious man, and he will be a good husband. Sadness when a girl buys a whole perfume in a dream indicates Marrying someone is unhealthy and you will not be satisfied with this marriage. A bottle of perfume in a complete dream for an ordinary woman indicates the comfort and stability that she will enjoy, as well as evidence of the wonderful beauty that distinguishes her. Why does a married woman dream of perfume? Seeing a perfume bottle for a married woman in a dream is full of visions that testify On the stability of life and family happiness that this woman enjoys with her family. A married woman who sprays perfume in a full dream, and has no children, is good news about her food, the imminence of pregnancy, and finding a good heir. For a married woman, the smell of incense in a dream is a sign of The goodness and blessing that she will have with her children and evidence of their success and reconciliation. Why does a divorced woman dream of perfume? Seeing all of a divorced woman’s perfume and spraying it on her clothes is evidence of that woman’s good work and character. In a complete dream, spraying perfume on the bed indicates that she will soon marry a good person. And become strong, and this will be a happy and successful marriage. Why does a divorced woman dream of a bottle of perfume, which means the means of life that will be at her disposal, and indicates her marriage to a man who gives jurisprudence and knowledge. Why does a pregnant woman dream of perfume? Seeing a bottle of perfume for a pregnant woman in a complete dream is one of the visions that indicates However, God will bless her with a beautiful and cute child. Spraying perfume on a pregnant woman in a perfect dream speaks of the safety of her and her baby, improving her condition, and getting rid of all problems. The perfect smell of perfume in a dream is one of the good visions that show the dreamer blessings in life and peace.
